Projects List (additional examples & references available upon request)
Aviation
Project: Thermal Network Masterplan, Melbourne Airport
Role: Lead Engineer
On behalf of MA, undertook a full thermal masterplan of the site including review of existing heating and cooling infrastructure serving all terminals, projected new system demands and infrastructure investment over the next 20 years.
Project: T4 Expansion, London Heathrow Airport
Role: Project Engineer
$6M refurbishment of Terminal 4, duties included full services design for expansion and renewal of existing systems and plant.
D2 Bussing Melbourne Airport T2 ASA Projects
Building Services Mechanical Lead for D2 Bussing concept design for APAM including coordination, preparation and delivery of the services package for additional bussing lounges in the International Terminal including scope for Infrastructure upgrades and costing estimates
Project: D8 Bussing Concept Design Melbourne Airport T2 ASA Projects
Role: Mechanical Lead
Building Services Mechanical Lead for D8 Bussing concept design for APAM including coordination, preparation and delivery of the services package for additional bussing lounges in the International Terminal including scope for Infrastructure upgrades and costing estimates.
Project: Pier D Expansion Concept Design Melbourne Airport T2 ASA Projects
Role: Mechanical Lead
Building Services Mechanical Lead for the Expansion design of existing Pier D for APAM including coordination, preparation and delivery of the services package for additional arrivals, departure and apron level services in the International Terminal including scope for infrastructure upgrades and costing estimates.
Project: Melbourne Airport T2 Arrivals
Role: Mechanical Lead
The project involved refurbishing and expanding the existing arrivals hall and improving passenger experience. The scope included assessing the complex staging requirements to maintain operation of the Arrivals hall throughout construction.
High resilience
Project: Microsoft SYD05 Data Centre, Marsden Park, Sydney Australia (Client: Microsoft)
Role: Mechanical Engineer
Lead Mechanical Consultant for this project, detailing and coordinating the design from inception through to detailed design & tender documentation for delivery of a new 36MW facility on a Greenfield site, to be delivered in 6MW modular scalable increments. The design of the project was in accordance with LEED Gold sustainability metrics and also met with Microsoft’s stringent redundancy and resilience requirements.
Residential
Project: 180 Chesterton, Cambridge
Role: Design Manager / Lead Engineer.
Commercial
Project: 80 Collins Street, office tower, Melbourne
Role: Design Manager / Mechanical Engineer
80 Collins Street development is at the ‘Paris end’ of Melbourne’s central business district, with the iconic 41 storey tower comprising of Premium Grade Office, Retail, Hotel, and basement carpark.
Project: Collins Square, Towers 4 & 5, Melbourne
Role: Mechanical Lead
48 storey commercial development consisting of Grade A/Premium Grade office, retail and parking facilities. The project environmental ratings targeted include a 5-star Green Star Design & As Built and 5-star NABERS Base Building Energy.
building to sheltered council accommodation for vulnerable user
